name: ESCANOR-lion-sin-of-pride
description: WhatsApp Bot (Escanor the Lion Sin of Pride) deployable to Heroku.

SESSION_ID.description: WhatsApp session ID string (paste from your session generator).

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Owner WhatsApp number in full international format, e.g. +254769279076

OWNER_NAME.description: Your display name for the bot owner.
